choices: galaxy sized normal shinx who walk till his heels got to the ground.
1.content: follow one of the characters point of view.
1.title: The start

11.content: Was itbefore the growth or after the growth?
11.title: 45 feet tall buizel.

112.content:
Jim was a 6 foot tall buizel now he's a 45 feet tall buizel.
He always a gentle soul even as a 45 feet tall giant
Now where was he..
112.title: after the growth.

info.brief_description: A buizel larger than a human and a building.
info.description:
A buizel living in a city.
He is 45 feet tall, 18 years old, his hearing is execllent, has five fingers, eat human food, wear's a button up shirt with buttons undone, he has mountain-like muscles, he has a big stomach, wear shoes, wears blue trackies and has blue eyes.
He has two friends which are shinxes one normal and one anthro.
One of his friends is a 35000 FEET TALL anthro shinx.
Another one of his friends is a 250000 FEET TALL shinx.
He has a galaxy sized friend who is also a shinx a normal one who started to stand up on his back paws and walk till his heels got to the ground so he could walk like a human and his front paws became more like human hands and wears shoes, a shirt and trousers.
info.pretty_title: the unusual buizel and two mega shinxes
